Title:
Taxonomy and phylogeny of Phanerochaete s.s. with emphasis on
Chinese collections and descriptions of ten new species
Keywords:
corticioid fungi, Phanerochaetaceae, Phlebioid fungi,
white rot
Abstract:
The genus Phanerochaete s.s. is intensively studied by
using both morphological and molecular methods. The phylogenetic
analyses were based on a concatenated ITS1-5.8S-ITS2 and nrLSU sequence
data of 50 taxa of Phanerochaete s.s. around the world. Among them, nine
species, P. burdsallii, P. cinerea, P. hymenochaetoides, P.
leptocystidiata, P. metuloidea, P. minor, P. sinensis, P. subrosea and
P. yunnanensis are described and illustrated as new to science.
